H0.text: In the 1870 'Siege of Metz', the French were besieged by which army. Austria

H1.text: In the 1870 'Siege of Metz', the French were besieged by which army. Russia

H2.text: In the 1870 'Siege of Metz', the French were besieged by which army. Britain

H3.text: In the 1870 'Siege of Metz', the French were besieged by which army. Prusia

A4.text: The French were besieged by the German forces under Prince Friedrich Karl of Prussia.

A5.text: Prince Friedrich Karl and the Prussian Second Army were now free to move against the French force in the Loire area.
